name: 傅子恒
objective:
本課程利用多項互動媒體製作工具進行互動媒體設計之實作。課程內容將從媒材的角度出發，透過對於各式媒材之實驗性處理，進一步深入理解其特徵以及可能性。

因應行業發展趨勢，【111-2 學期】將密集討論 AI 輔助設計。

This course uses a variety of interactive media production tools to implement interactive media. The content of the course will start from the perspective of media, through the experimental treatment of various media, to further understand its characteristics and possibilities.

In response to the development trend of the industry, [Semester 111-2] will intensively discuss AI-assisted design.
